# UITraitChangeRegistration | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ UIKit ](/documentation/uikit)

- [ UITraitChangeRegistration ](/documentation/UIKit/UITraitChangeRegistration)

-  UITraitChangeRegistration 

Protocol# UITraitChangeRegistration

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
@MainActor
protocol UITraitChangeRegistration : NSCopying, NSObjectProtocol
```

## [ Mentioned in ](/documentation/UIKit/UITraitChangeRegistration#mentions)

[ Building a desktop-class iPad app ](/documentation/uikit/building-a-desktop-class-ipad-app)## [Relationships](/documentation/UIKit/UITraitChangeRegistration#relationships)

### [Inherits From](/documentation/UIKit/UITraitChangeRegistration#inherits-from)

- [`NSCopying`](/documentation/Foundation/NSCopying)

- [`NSObjectProtocol`](/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObjectProtocol)

## [See Also](/documentation/UIKit/UITraitChangeRegistration#see-also)

### [Observing trait changes](/documentation/UIKit/UITraitChangeRegistration#Observing-trait-changes)

[`func registerForTraitChanges([UITrait], action: Selector) -> any UITraitChangeRegistration`](/documentation/uikit/uitraitchangeobservable-67e94/registerfortraitchanges(_:action:))Registers a list of traits to observe, and calls a method on the receiving object when one of the observed traits changes.**Required**

[`func registerForTraitChanges<TraitEnvironment>([UITrait], handler: Self.TraitChangeHandler<TraitEnvironment>) -> any UITraitChangeRegistration`](/documentation/uikit/uitraitchangeobservable-67e94/registerfortraitchanges(_:handler:))Registers a list of traits to observe and a closure to execute when one of the observed traits changes.**Required**

[`func registerForTraitChanges([UITrait], target: Any, action: Selector) -> any UITraitChangeRegistration`](/documentation/uikit/uitraitchangeobservable-67e94/registerfortraitchanges(_:target:action:))Registers a list of traits to observe, and calls a method on the specified target object when one of the observed traits changes.**Required**

[`func unregisterForTraitChanges(any UITraitChangeRegistration)`](/documentation/uikit/uitraitchangeobservable-67e94/unregisterfortraitchanges(_:))Tells the system to stop observing previously registered traits.**Required**

[`typealias TraitChangeHandler`](/documentation/uikit/uitraitchangeobservable-67e94/traitchangehandler)A closure the system executes when observed traits change.
